name: Changed: UR (Changed Fangame)
description:
Changed fangame. Simple as that.

It's a remake, kind of, planning to add:

- More bosses with unique attacks

- More areas

- More characters, maybe even to PLAY as.

- Shop

- Crafting. meaning harder puzzles and more thinking.

- Making the game way harder, game takes longer to beat once it's finished.

THIS GAME IS FOR PEOPLE ABOVE AT LEAST THE AGE OF 12. THIS GAME CONTAINS:

Swear words, violence, gore might be added.

Also..

This game has some songs that may be copyrighted, however I have no intentions on making money off of this game, making it for fun.

I am NOT a furry. There are no transfurs, probably not adding them. Making it slightly serious.

CURRENT VERSION: O.0.1 (2 areas, unfinished rooms, one boss.)
